channel.title: Construction and More @@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@
channel.description:
I am currently running a tokkul scape source 508. I want to add construction to it. Can someone point me in the direction of a tutorial.
Now how about shops. Is there a way to make it so you can sell to shops? All my shops pop up and you can only buy from them. If you right click on an object, it says stuff like wield drop etc...

item.title: Construction and More @@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@
item.dc:creator: @server868 server868
item.description:
@server868 wrote:

Tried tutorials and searched. Couldnt find it. They were all posts on downloading servers.

Read full topic
